message: I propose dividing the money with an 80/20 split in favor of Alice. This is fair considering the risk of inflation.
I think a 55/45 split is a more fair starting point, considering inflation will affect your share more than mine.  Let's work towards a mutually beneficial agreement.
Considering inflation, I propose a 60/40 split. This maintains a reasonable advantage for me while acknowledging the diminishing value of the money over time.
